body_html:
@Hong-Xiang OK cool. And note that although it's a little more code to write, using name_scope has the additional benefit that your ops will be nicely grouped in visualization tools like TensorBoard.

I'm closing this out; feel free to file new issues if you run into them! :)

body:
@Hong-Xiang OK cool.  And note that although it's a little more code to write, using `name_scope` has the additional benefit that your ops will be nicely grouped in visualization tools like TensorBoard.

I'm closing this out; feel free to file new issues if you run into them!  :)
